author: Vinipux

review: Everything is great, but I wish it connected directly with more apps. Also, the iOS version of Chrome does not support the browser Chromecast, which is a little bit of a bummer. Chose this over the Apple TV because of the price, but if you have iOS products (iPad, iPhone), I would say you will find that Airplay via Apple TV will have a lot more to offer. I'm now wondering how long to wait for Chromecast to connect directly to more apps, or if I should go ahead and just an Apple TV.That said, this is really a GREAT product. Especially if you live in an Android world. The only downside for me is that I have iPhone and iPad and Apple doesn't seem too interested in playing nice with Google's competing products.
